LINE(1) User Commands LINE(1)

NAME

line - read one line

SYNOPSIS

line

DESCRIPTION

Line copies one line from standard input to standard output. If end-of-file is reached on input or if a read error occurs, its exit status is non-zero. Line always writes a newline as the last character.

SEE ALSO

read(1)
